issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Hi!

I'm running Appcelerator Studio x64 for Linux under Ubuntu 14.04 LTS.

And i'm already ran this commands below.


{code:java}
sudo apt-get install libjpeg62 libwebkitgtk-1.0-0
echo 'export MOZILLA_FIVE_HOME=/usr/lib/mozilla' >> ~/.bashrc
{code}

And, i do have ACS, Alloy, Titanium CLI and other stuff installed via NPM.
And, i do have Oracle-Java-7 installed.
And, i already ran this command "appc setup"

But still i having this error: http://imgur.com/5fOryax

If it helps, i followed this instruction: http://tutorialforlinux.com/2014/04/19/how-to-install-appcelerator-titanium-studio-on-ubuntu-14-04-trusty-lts-64bit-linux-step-by-step/
Is there a way to launch Appcelerator Studio in Ubuntu 14.04 LTS?

Versions of installed stuff:


{code:java}
NodeJS: v0.12.7
Alloy: 1.7.29
Acs: 1.0.32
Titanium CLI: 5.0.5
Titanium SDK: 4.0.0.GA [selected]  4.0.0.v20150518154210 /home/abraham/.titanium/mobilesdk/linux/4.0.0.GA
{code}


p.s. running this from terminal not helping (even Login button not works).
fields.summary: Studio: Error connecting to download server Ubuntu 14.04 LTS

comments.body: Hello, Please follow the official Appcelerator instruction for installing in Ubuntu. Download the latest stable studio from [here|https://platform.appcelerator.com/#/product/studio]. Now after installing the studio, follow this [link|https://platform.appcelerator.com/#/product/cli] to install CLI. Hope this helps, Please reply if you face further problem. Thanks.
@Sharif, i already done that, and i'm running exactly Appcelerator studio for Linux x64, and with this configuration i have described issue.
